name: Endless Swarm (LD48 Prototype)
description:
Super rough prototype for a rogue lite game, we scoped too large, as expected, and couldn't achieve a decent result but still a great experience for our first game jam.

Gameplay is basically non existent at the moment but we achieved a basic procedural generation for building our levels.

A lot of assets couldn't be used in the end for technical and time reasons.  We will try to improve this in the future.

We are extremely tired at the moment but looking forward to the next one.
